attributes.action: undertake to plant more native trees in london parks and replace trees lost due to recent weather conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many trees have been lost in recent years due to weather and vandalism in londons parks and woodlands, these trees need replacing! we need more trees in london, as they are disappearing

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/planttrees/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
